verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H0853"\w* end, destroy \w not|strong="H1732"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H5921"\w* inscription \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* title, \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* fled \w from|strong="H5921"\w* Saul \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* cave. [1 Kings 24]

\w Have|strong="H3605"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H3605"\w*, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H3605"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* soul trusteth \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thee. \w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy wings \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* hope, until iniquity pass \w away|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* cry \w to|strong="H3117"\w* God \w the|strong="H3605"\w* most \w High|strong="H4791"\w*; \w to|strong="H3117"\w* God \w who|strong="H3605"\w* hath \w done|strong="H3605"\w* good \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3117"\w* hath sent \w from|strong="H0413"\w* heaven \w and|strong="H3117"\w* delivered \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w he|strong="H3117"\w* hath made \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3117"\w* reproach \w that|strong="H3117"\w* trod \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*. \w God|strong="H0413"\w* hath sent \w his|strong="H0413"\w* mercy \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H0413"\w* truth,

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* hath delivered \w my|strong="H3808"\w* soul \w from|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* midst \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* young lions. \w I|strong="H1697"\w* slept troubled. \w The|strong="H1697"\w* sons \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w men|strong="H1320"\w*, whose teeth \w are|strong="H4100"\w* weapons \w and|strong="H0430"\w* arrows, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* tongue \w a|strong="H3808"\w* sharp sword.

\w Be|strong="H1697"\w* thou exalted, O God, \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* heavens, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* thy glory \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* prepared \w a|strong="H0834"\w* snare \w for|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* feet; \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* bowed down \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* dug \w a|strong="H0834"\w* pit before \w my|strong="H8104"\w* face, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* fallen into \w it|strong="H8104"\w*.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w is|strong="H0430"\w* ready, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w is|strong="H0430"\w* ready: \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* Sing, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* rehearse \w a|strong="H5921"\w* psalm.
Arise, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* glory, arise psaltery \w and|strong="H5612"\w* harp: \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* arise early.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* Lord, among \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H3045"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* sing \w a|strong="H3588"\w* psalm \w to|strong="H7725"\w* thee among \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nations.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* magnified even \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* heavens: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy truth unto \w the|strong="H3068"\w* clouds.

\w Be|strong="H3808"\w* thou exalted, \w O|strong="H4100"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, above \w the|strong="H3372"\w* heavens: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* thy glory above all \w the|strong="H3372"\w* earth.
